definition.text: The User Bots hierarchy stores definitions for all Bots associated with the current User Profile available on the Superalgos Peer to Peer Network.

paragraphs.text: Unlike bots found within the Superalgos Platfrom (as described in this article Bots In Superalgos), bots held in this hierarchy run within the context of the Superalgos Peer to Peer Network.

A helpful way to differenciate these kinds of bots is to remember that bots running in the platform complete tasks within the platform. While bots running on the network complete tasks on the network.

What this means is that bots under this hierarchy are meant to be discoverable on the Superalgos Peer to Peer Network. This allows these bots to do things such as send trading signals across the network or interact with other bots on the network in social trading activities.
